question.string: What was the average aid to environment per month in year 2010?
What is the average yearly aid over the Finnfund channel?
How much money was given to strengthen civil society in Yemen?
How much is committed in Ethiopia?
How much does Peru receive for fishery research a year?
How many countries have extended amounts of > 1000000 $?
What is the total aid to Egypt?
Which were the top 10 aided countries in 2011?
question.query: select ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?result. ?obs lso:refYear "2011"^^xsd:gYear. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))) limit 10

question.string: How much money give Finnish Red Cross on health education?
What is the amount of aid and the amount of commitments per country per year?
question.query: select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?total_aid sum(xsd:decimal(?commitments)) as ?total_commitments ?country { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?commitments. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. } group by ?country

question.string: How much money did the Egyptian government receive for rural development?
What's are the 10 highest aid amounts?
How much did Uruguay receive?
How much money goes into food crop production over time?
In South and Central Asia, how much aid was given to the regional FLEG programme in Mekong?
How much money Embassy of Finland contribute to Egyptian projects?
Are there observations whose start date is after their end date?
What is average aid amount per aid sector?
How much money gets each country in 2008?
How much extended amounts are given to Tajikistan for rescheduling and refinancing?
How much aid receives a country?
What is the total Dignity International aid from all sectors?
How much money Nepal receives for Environmental policy and administrative management?
Top 10 aid receiving geographic areas in south east and central asia?
question.query:
select ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. ?obs lso:finland-aid-geographical-target-area ?result.
filter(?aid!=0&&?result!=""). } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))) limit 10

question.string: Which country has the lowest amount of commitments?
question.query: select ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?c. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?result. } order by asc(sum(xsd:decimal(?c))) limit 1

question.string: Which countries received more than they were committed?
question.query: select ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?c. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?result. } group by ?result having sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))>sum(xsd:decimal(?c))

question.string: Where is the biggest aid for medical services?
question.query: select ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/12191>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?result. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))) limit 1

question.string: Which country receives the biggest share of its aid from Fida International?
Which types of flow are there?
For which sectors is the money, invested into Sierra Leona, used for?
How many percent aid of a country is for that countries administrative costs?
Which type of sector is receiving the most in India?
question.query: select ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/in>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1

question.string: How much aid is received by Zambia on a single day?
What was the total amount recieved by Yemen in 2010?
Which countries got more than 1000000 € but less than 10000000 € in 2010?
question.query: select ?country { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2010"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. } group by ?country having (sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))>1000000&&sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))<10000000)

question.string: Which countries got between 10000 € and 100000 € in 2011?
question.query: select ?country { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2011"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. } group by ?country having (sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))>10000&&sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))<100000)

question.string: How much money did Pyongyang receive for health education?
What types of aid did Mexico receive?
What types of aid did Belarus receive in 2007?
What types of aid did the Maldives receive in 2011 for Oil-fired power plants?
question.query: select distinct(?result) { ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/mv>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-type-of-aid ?result. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/23061>. ?obs lso:refYear "2011"^^xsd:gYear. }

question.string: What is the total amount of Gambia in 2008?
How many countries had amounts of more than 1000000 € in 2010?
question.query: select count(?country) as ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2010"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. } group by ?country having sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))>1000000

question.string: How many countries received more than 1000000 € for government administration in 2006?
question.query: select count(?country) as ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2006"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/15140>. } group by ?country having sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))>1000000

question.string: How much does Crisis Management Initiative spend on strengthening civil society compared to legal and judicial development?
How much money, does the UNDP spend on elections compared to post-conflict peace building?
What is the type of aid with the lowest total amount?
What are the top 5 types of aid regarding the amount?
question.query: select ?type { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-type-of-aid ?type. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 5

question.string: What total amount did Zimbabwe get?
What is the average commitment for chemicals?
What was the largest aid for debt forgiveness in 2007?
question.query:
select max(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/60020>. ?obs lso:refYear "2008"^^xsd:gYear. }

question.string: How much is the total aid amount by the World Health Organization?
How much did Nepal receive for agricultural extension?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/31166>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/np>. }

question.string: How much did the Philippines receive in 2007?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:refYear "2007"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/ph>. }

question.string: How much was spent for strenthening civil society in 2007?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:refYear "2007"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/15150>. }

question.string: What is the total amount given over the World Vision Colombia channel in 2007?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:refYear "2007"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "World Vision Colombia". }

question.string: What is the amount given to Tajikistan in 2007 for Rescheduling and refinancing?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:refYear "2007"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/60040>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/tj>. }

question.string: How much was committed in total for Namibia over Martinus-säätiö for Basic health infrastructure?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?c)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?c. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/12230>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/na>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Finnish NGO, Martinus-säätiö". }

question.string: What were the average extended amounts for Pakistan over Suomen Lähetysseura ry in 2009?
question.query:
select avg(xsd:decimal(?ae)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-amounts-extended ?ae. ?obs lso:refYear "2009"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/pk>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Finnish NGO, Suomen Lähetysseura ry". }

question.string: What were the total commitments for Agricultural extension by the Embassy of Finland before 2010?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?c)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?c. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/31166>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Embassy of Finland". filter(year(?year)<2010) }

question.string: What was the highest commitment for support to local and regional NGOs for Guatemala after 2005 and before 2010 given by the Embassy of Finland?
question.query:
select max(xsd:decimal(?c)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?c. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/gt>. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/92030>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Embassy of Finland". filter(year(?year)>2005&&year(?year)<2010) }

question.string: How much money does Uruguay get from Finnfund for forest industries?
question.query:
select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/uy>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/32162>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Finnfund". }

question.string: How many countries were aided by World Vision Peru?
How many sectors does Kvaerner Tamturbine Ltd fund?
When was money committed for vocational training?
question.query:
select distinct(?date) { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?commitment. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/11330>. ?obs lso:refDate ?date. filter(xsd:decimal(?commitment>0)) }

question.string: Which year had the highest total commitment for agricultural research?
question.query:
select ?result { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:refYear ?result. ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?commitment. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/31182>. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?commitment))) limit 1

question.string: When was the highest commitment for agricultural research and what was its amount?
question.query:
select ?date xsd:decimal(?commitment) { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:refDate ?date. ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?commitment. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/31182>. } order by desc(xsd:decimal(?commitment)) limit 1

question.string: When was money committed for supporting state-tribe dialogue in Yemen?
question.query:
select ?date { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:refDate ?date. ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?commitment. ?obs lso:finland-aid-short-description-project-title "Supporting State-Tribe Dialogue in Yemen" . ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/ye>. filter(xsd:decimal(?commitment)>0). }

question.string: In which years was the total amount given for medical services higher than that for basic nutrition?
In which years did Bhutan get aid?
How many of the countries got more than 100000000 € in 2011?
How many sectors per recipient country?
question.query: select count(?sector) ?country {?obs lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country.} group by ?country

question.string: How much money was given each country for Health education?
How many sectors does WFP fund?
question.query: select count(?sector) {?obs lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "WFP".}

question.string: How much did the top 10 aided countries get in 2008?
question.query: select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?total ?country { ?obs lso:refYear "2008"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. } group by ?country order by desc(?total) limit 10

question.string: How many countries received aid in 2009?
Which country received aid for the most sectors?
question.query: select ?country count(distinct(?sector)) { ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country } group by ?country order by desc(count(?sector)) limit 1

question.string: When did Namibia get aid for basic health infrastructure?
When did Kenya receive aid in the year 2010?
When did Paraguy get money from the Finish Red Cross?
When was the earliest start date for agricultural extension aid in 2009?
question.query: select distinct(?date) { ?obs lso:finland-aid-start-date ?date. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/31166>. ?obs lso:refYear "2009"^^xsd:gYear. } order by asc(xsd:date(?date)) limit 1

question.string: What is the latest start date of disaster prevention and preparedness aid over the Suomen Punainen Risti channel?
question.query: select distinct(?date) { ?obs lso:finland-aid-start-date ?date. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/74010>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Finnish NGO, Suomen Punainen Risti". } order by desc(xsd:date(?date)) limit 1

question.string: When are the end dates of aid from Finnfund to Ethiopia for Energy policy and administrative management?
question.query: select distinct(?date) { ?obs lso:finland-aid-end-date ?date. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/23010>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Finnfund". ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/et>. }

question.string: What are the titles of projects which teach basic life skills for youth and adults in Tanzania?
How much did UNDSS commit in 2006?
question.query: select sum(xsd:decimal(?commit)) { ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?commit. ?obs lso:refYear "2006"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "UNDSS". ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. }

question.string: In which countries was education on sexual and reproductive health in evening schools funded?
What types of aid were given to the Project to support the Geological Survey of Tanzania?
When were commitments made to the area of Lusaka and Ndola?
question.query: select distinct ?date {?obs lso:finland-aid-geographical-target-area "Lusaka and Ndola". ?obs lso:refDate ?date.}

question.string: When was the first start date of aid by the Crisis Management Initiative in Liberia?
question.query: select ?date {?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Finnish NGO, Crisis Management Initiative". ?obs lso:finland-aid-start-date ?date. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/lr>} order by asc(?date) limit 1

question.string: Did the Ukraine receive money in 2009?
question.query: ask{?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/ua>. ?obs lso:refYear "2009"^^xsd:gYear.}

question.string: Was Ethiopia given money for primary education?
question.query: ask {?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/et>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/11220>.}

question.string: Did Finnish Church Aid give money to Somalia?
question.query: ask {?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/so>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Finnish NGO, Finnish Church Aid".}

question.string: Which countries got aid for human rights as well as for nuclear power plants?
What is the average number of full years between between the start and end date?
How many countries recieved more aid in 2011 than in 2010?
What are the 10 sectors with the highest total amount?
question.query: select distinct ?sector { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 10

question.string: How many countries recieve aid both in 2006 and in 2010?
What is the country with the lowest average aid amount?
question.query: select ?country { ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. } order by asc(avg(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1

question.string: Which are the sectors of aid to the geographical area of Dhaka?
In how many years did Sierra Leona recieve aid for malaria control?
Which sectors have Paraguay and the Central African Republic in common?
question.query: select distinct ?sector { ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/cf>. ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/py>. }
